tool_description: This api returns various kinds of Beverages and Desserts
name: Beverages and Desserts
title: Beverages and Desserts

api_list.name: Get Desserts by there Id
Get Beverage by there Id
Get all the Desserts
api_list.description: This endpoint will returns all the** Desserts**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/desserts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/desserts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.name: McFlurry with OREO Cookies
test_endpoint.desc: The McDonald’s McFlurry® with OREO® Cookies is a popular combination of creamy vanilla soft serve with crunchy pieces of OREO® cookies! Available in regular and snack sizes. There are 510 calories in a regular size OREO® McFlurry® at McDonald's. Check out all the McFlurry® flavors on the McDonald's Desserts & Shakes menu.

test_endpoint.name: McFlurry with M&M'S Candies
test_endpoint.desc: The McDonald’s M&M ® McFlurry® is a sweet, creamy M&M’S® dessert of vanilla soft serve with M&M’S® chocolate candies swirled in. Available in Regular Size and Snack Size.

test_endpoint.name: Vanilla Cone
test_endpoint.desc: Enjoy our creamy vanilla soft serve in a crispy cone! It's the perfect sweet treat in addition to any McDonald's meal or on its own! There are 200 calories in McDonald's soft serve cones!

test_endpoint.name: Chocolate Shake
test_endpoint.desc: Try the McDonald’s Chocolate Shake, the perfect sweet treat for any time of the day. Our chocolate shake is made with delicious soft serve, chocolate syrup and finished off with a creamy whipped topping. McDonald's Chocolate Shake is available in small, medium and large.

test_endpoint.name: Vanilla Shake
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald's vanilla shake is made with our creamy vanilla soft serve and topped with whipped topping for a cool, tasty treat. Available in small, medium, and large. There are 510 calories in a small vanilla shake at McDonald's.

test_endpoint.name: Strawberry Shake
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald's Strawberry Shake is made with creamy vanilla soft serve, blended with strawberry syrup and topped with whipped topping. There are 530 calories in a small Strawberry Shake at McDonald's. Available in small, medium, and large.

test_endpoint.name: Hot Fudge Sundae
test_endpoint.desc: Our classic hot fudge sundae is made with creamy vanilla soft serve and smothered in chocolaty hot fudge topping. There are 330 calories in a Hot Fudge Sundae at McDonald's.

test_endpoint.name: Hot Caramel Sundae
test_endpoint.desc: Treat yourself to a Hot Caramel Sundae at McDonald's! This Caramel Sundae combines creamy vanilla soft serve and warm, buttery caramel topping.

test_endpoint.name: Baked Apple Pie
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald's Baked Apple Pie recipe features 100% American-grown apples, and a lattice crust baked to perfection and topped with sprinkled sugar. There are 230 calories in McDonald's apple pie. Pair it with a Hot Caramel Sundae for your own twist on Apple Pie A-La-Mode! Order a Baked Apple Pie

test_endpoint.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald's classic chocolate chip cookie, loaded with chocolate chips. It's a soft baked cookie and warmed to perfection.

api_list.name: Get all the Beverages
api_list.description: This endpoint will returns all the **Beverages**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/beverages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com/beverages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "beverages-and-desserts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.name: Coca-Cola
test_endpoint.desc: Coca-Cola® is a refreshing McDonald's soda option that complements all of your menu favorites.

test_endpoint.name: Sprite
test_endpoint.desc: Cool off with the refreshing McDonald's Sprite® - the classic and delicious lemon-lime fountain drink. Now, you might be asking does Sprite® have caffeine? No, Sprite® is a caffeine-free soda that makes the perfect addition to any McDonald’s Combo Meal. There are 140 calories in a Small Sprite® at McDonald's.

test_endpoint.name: Dr Pepper
test_endpoint.desc: Satisfy your taste buds with the unique taste of Dr Pepper® at McDonald's. Wondering what flavor is Dr Pepper®? This classic and refreshing fountain drink is a unique blend of 23 flavors. Dr Pepper® pairs perfectly with your favorite McDonald’s Burgers and World Famous Fries®. There are 140 calories in a small Dr Pepper at McDonald's. Available in extra small, small, medium, and large.

test_endpoint.name: Fanta Orange
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald’s Fanta® Orange is a caffeine-free soft drink full of bubbly, refreshing orange flavor. There are 150 calories in a small Fanta® Orange. Fanta® Orange soda is part of McDonald’s $1 Any Size Soft Drinks on the $1 on our $1 $2 $3 Dollar Menu. Available in small, medium, and large fountain drink sizes.

test_endpoint.name: Diet Coke
test_endpoint.desc: Try an icy cold Diet Coke®, with zero calories. It’s a staple to any McDonald's meal available on the $1 $2 $3 Dollar Menu. Wondering why Diet Coke® at McDonald’s tastes so good? We ensure our Coke® products are fresh and always tasting the way they should by following the guidelines set by Coca-Cola®, using a ratio of syrup that allows ice to melt, and pre chilling the Coca-Cola® syrup and water before they enter our soda fountain! Diet Coke® is available in extra small, small, medium and large fountain drink sizes.

test_endpoint.name: Hi-C® Orange Lavaburst®
test_endpoint.desc: You asked for it, you got it—Hi-C Orange at McDonald’s is back! With a fruity flavor that teases your tastebuds it’s the perfect addition to any McDonald’s meal. You can use the Hi-C Orange Finder which will be updated weekly as Hi-C Orange is rolled out across the country to find the closest McDonald’s near you already offering the beverage. There are 160 calories in a small Hi-C Orange.

test_endpoint.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
test_endpoint.desc: The McCafé® Strawberry Banana Smoothie recipe features the perfect combination of real strawberry and banana fruit purees and juices, blended with creamy low fat yogurt and ice. As a part of the McCafé® Menu, Strawberry Banana Smoothie is available in small, medium, and large sizes. There are 190 calories in a small McDonald's Strawberry Banana Smoothie.

test_endpoint.name: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
test_endpoint.desc: The McDonald’s Mango Pineapple Smoothie recipe features the sweet combination of fruit juices and purees such as mango and pineapple, blended with creamy low fat yogurt and ice. Find all our smoothies on the McCafé® Menu in small, medium and large. There are 200 calories in a small mango pineapple smoothie at McDonald's.

test_endpoint.name: Sweet Tea
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald’s Sweet Tea is made from a briskly refreshing blend of orange pekoe and pekoe cut black tea, sweetened to perfection. Sweet Tea from McDonald’s is part of the Beverages Menu. Available in extra small, small, medium and large.

test_endpoint.name: Unsweetened Iced Tea
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald’s Iced Tea is made with a brisk blend of orange pekoe black tea, freshly brewed and served ice cold. McDonald’s Unsweet Iced Tea is available in extra small, small, medium and large on the McDonald’s drinks menu.

test_endpoint.name: Hot Tea
test_endpoint.desc: Refresh your mornings with the best Hot Tea at McDonald's. McDonald's Hot Tea has a robust black tea flavor with hints of floral and orange notes. There are 10 calories in a small McDonald's Hot Tea. Enjoy a McDonald's Hot Tea when you order with Mobile Order & Pay! Pair a Hot Tea with any of your favorite McCafé® Bakery or Breakfast items to give a perfect start to your morning.

test_endpoint.name: Minute Maid Premium Orange Juice
test_endpoint.desc: 100% orange juice, packed with Vitamin C. Available in Small, Medium and Large.

test_endpoint.name: Honest Kids® Appley Ever After® Organic Juice Drink
test_endpoint.desc: onest Kids Juice drink is sweetened only with fruit juice, and it’s an organic drink perfect for a kids meal! If you’re looking for kids organic juice drink options, add the Honest Kids® Appley Ever After® Organic Juice Drink to any Happy Meal®!

test_endpoint.name: 1% Low Fat Milk Jug
test_endpoint.desc: McDonald's Milk Jug is a low fat milk and an excellent source of calcium and a good source of vitamin A&D! Add it to a Happy Meal®

test_endpoint.name: Reduced Sugar* Low Fat Chocolate Milk Jug
test_endpoint.desc: A handheld chocolate milk jug, full of low fat chocolate milk, a good source of Vitamin A&D.

ingredients.name: Reduced Sugar Low Fat Chocolate Milk

test_endpoint.name: Hot Chocolate
test_endpoint.desc: Taste the delicious chocolatey flavor of a McCafé® Hot Chocolate. Hot chocolate made with steamed whole milk, rich chocolate syrup and topped with whipped topping and chocolate drizzle. There are 370 calories in a small Hot Chocolate.
